Package com.vashtibauson.library

Class Print

java.lang.Object
com.vashtibauson.library.Print
public class Print extends Object
Utility class for printing menus and obtaining user input for a library management system.

    • Print

      public Print(Scanner scanner)
      Constructor to initialize the Print object with a Scanner for user input.

  • Method Details

    • itemTypePrint

      public int itemTypePrint() throws InvalidInputTypeException
      Displays the item type selection menu and retrieves the user's choice.
      Returns:
      Integer representing the chosen item type (1 for Book, 2 for E-Book)
      Throws:
      InvalidInputTypeException - If the user input is not a valid integer

    • actionMenuPrint

      public char actionMenuPrint(String itemType) throws InvalidInputTypeException
      Displays the action menu based on the item type and retrieves the user's choice.
      Parameters:
      itemType - Type of item (Book or E-Book) for which the action menu is displayed
      Returns:
      Character representing the chosen action (A, B, C, D)
      Throws:
      InvalidInputTypeException - If the user input is not a valid character

    • getBookDetails

      public Book getBookDetails() throws InvalidInputTypeException
      Prompts the user for details to create a new Book object.
      Returns:
      Book object created with user-provided details
      Throws:
      InvalidInputTypeException - If the user input for ISBN is not a valid integer

    • getEBookDetails

      public EBook getEBookDetails() throws InvalidInputTypeException
      Prompts the user for details to create a new EBook object.
      Returns:
      EBook object created with user-provided details
      Throws:
      InvalidInputTypeException - If the user input for ISBN, file size, or file format is invalid
